## Aim

## Load Packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)   
library(plotly) 
library(here)
```


## Read in Data

```{r}
dev_data <- read_csv(here("./inputs/dev_concerns_all.csv"))
simd_data <- read_csv(here("./inputs/SIMD 2020v2.csv"))
```


## Prepare Data


```{r}
glimpse(dev_data) 

glimpse(simd_data)

dev_data %>% distinct(area_type)
```
## Filter data to keep only the variables needed

```{r}
HB_dev <- dev_data %>% 
  select(area_name, area_code, year, numerator, measure) 
glimpse(HB_dev)

simd_HB <- simd_data %>% 
  select(IntZone, HB, SIMD2020V2HBQuintile)
glimpse(simd_HB)
```
```{r}
HB_dev %>% distinct(area_code)

simd_HB %>% distinct(IntZone)
```
